isis.stitle: ALTERNATOR: DELCO-REMY 20-SI SERIES, TYPE 300 (BRUSHLESS) - MAGNETIZING THE ROTOR

svcproc.title: MAGNETIZING THE ROTOR
svcproc.para: The rotor normally retains magnetism to provide voltage build-up when the engine is started. After disassembly or servicing, however, it may be necessary to re-establish the magnetism. To magnetize the rotor connect the alternator to the battery in the normal manner. Momentarily connect a jumper lead from the battery positive post to the "R" terminal on the alternator ( Figure 1). This procedure will restore the normal residual magnetism in the rotor.
